content.rendered:
2021 Mother’s Day Mass

Our 2021 Mother’s Day Mass on Friday 7 May was a wonderful celebration of all the special mothers and mother figures in our community.

Thank you to the Parents’ Association, for their beautiful contributions of gift bags for our Mums, and delicious treats for students who attended.

We acknowledge the contributions of:

  • Year 7 Mum Jodie Sahib, for sourcing Intimo, Designer Dress and Rodan & Fields Dermatologist vouchers for our gift bags
  • MECCA for beauty products
  • Our Parents’ Association Presidents, Fiona Topliff and Lillian Talarico, and all our PA committee members for their behind-the-scenes work in bringing the event to life

Happy Mother’s Day to all Mums and mother figures in our community!
